Master of Enchanting
%% Obtained from the mobs try to sharpen the scrolls Staff.%% The more you sharpen it, the more valuable the reward you get.%% %% Besides hunting monsters, you can buy a sharpening of the master.%% On one account is available 24 grinding for 6 hours 6000 Adena.%% Impatient can acquire more sharpening, but for 77 777 Adena each.%% %% Once you've finished grinding staff, take it to the master and get a reward.%%
